cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 45 miles ENE of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest, forecast to cross central and western Cuba Monday and then move toward the Florida Keys/west coast of Florida Tuesday–Wednesday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watches in effect for Cayman Brac and Little Cayman, portions of western Cuba, and part of the Florida Keys
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warnings for southern Haiti, Jamaica, and much of eastern and central Cuba; Hurricane Watch for portions of eastern Cuba
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Greater Antilles (Haiti, Jamaica, Cuba) and expected to affect Florida Keys and west coast of Florida
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no Puerto Rico‐proximate point in the NHC wind-probability table for Advisory 16)
weather_observation.wind: None expected at San Juan, PR from Elsa during the 5-day forecast period
